QuestData.Title: Possessive Headgear
QuestData.Description: It is fortunate that we have found Alby. He has filled me in on the situation in the packing district.$b$bIt's not good, $n.$b$bThe workers walk, yes. They work as if nothing is out of the ordinary, yet they are controlled by parasites. Mindstealers that force them to do their bidding.$b$bIt is they who contaminate the shipments.$b$bYou must destroy as many of those mindstealers as you can. Free the minds of the possessed!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Parasitic Mindstealers controlling Possessed Dockworkers in the Anglepoint Packing District.
QuestData.CompletionText: Our priority is saving our people. We must do whatever we can.
QuestData.RewardText: This has never been a simple illness. There is foul magic at work here.
